item.title: Aunt Jo's Christmas Ricotta Cookies
item.description: Everybody has an aunt with their own way of making those Italian Christmas cookies. And I’ve discovered that my Aunt Jo has a second recipe for making these cookies! I’ll be back with the better of the two after a taste-test.
